question: Which racing driver has won the Formula One Austrian Grand Prix event?
explanation:
Ace racing driver of Finland Valtteri Bottas has recently won the season-opening Austrian Grand Prix at Spielberg.
Formula One champion Lewis Hamilton could finish only in the fourth position, after he suffered a penalty. Charles Leclerc bagged the second place for Ferrari and 20-year-old racer Lando Norris won third position for McLaren.
